New_Orleans.WEZB: WEZB (97.1 FM, branded B97) is a mainstream Top-40 contemporary hit radio (CHR) radio station in New Orleans, Louisiana. The station is owned by Entercom and they broadcast their format at 97.1 MHz with an effective radiated power (ERP) of 100,000 watts. The station's studios are located at the 400 Poydras Tower in New Orleans' downtown area, and the transmitter site is in the city's Algiers district.
